column4: Hey guys, I messued up GRUB after installing windows and now windows got a BSOD Lol! anyway Im having problems fixing GRUB and im following the ubuntu wiki for recovering grub
https://help.ubuntu.com/community/RecoveringUbuntuAfterInstallingWindows this one to be precise
When I go to grub it loads almost instantly
I think theres something going wrong here because I dont see the usual probing devices
i think it is just reading from the map
And then when I type root (hd0,3) which is where grub is, it says the disk doesnt exist....
oh.
Error 21
Im on my live cd right now so you can give me commands if need be
find /vmlinuz
see if it returns a disk
It returns /vmlinuz
Wait
Do i enter that in grub or normal terminal?
In grub I get Error 15: File not found
oh you are running from a live cd......... that would be done in grub
i'm clueless......
Ill try remounting my partitions
then again the last time i made that mistake was on 6.10 >.<
This is a regular thing for me lol
I have to sync my zune every 2 or so months
Hey aetaric I figured it out lol silly me I did "grub" not "sudo grub"
Dont ask to ask, ask your question
i would have done the same thing >.< then again i like to be ROOT sometimes
